desc: We offer the first full line of primer, paints, and coatings utilizing SILVERCLEAN® technology: continuously eliminating odor-causing bacteria, mold, and mildew for the life of the product.

layout.text:
SILVERARMOR®
TRUSTED PROTECTION THAT NEVER SLEEPS
Our exclusive nanotechnology, SILVERCLEAN, eliminates odor-causing bacteria, mold, and mildew in all of our products.
